name: Data Platform Developer
description:
As a Data Platform Developer within Data practice, you will be responsible for the solution design and implementation utilizing Teradata and 3rd party products leveraged with customer requirements.

Main Responsibilities:

  • Capture customer’s requirement for Data Warehousing and Analytical solutions and develops solution architecture utilizing core Teradata Products: Teradata Advanced SQL Engine, Teradata Query Grid, Teradata Unity
  • Deliver project in accordance to agreed specifications and requirements during all project stages (development, UAT, production) and in various projects roles (usually as development team lead or individual developer)
  • Participate in the follow up of the delivered products and solutions to enable the solution support and evolution
  • Occasional participation in presale activities, PoC/PoT projects

Requirements:

  • 2+ years’ experience of participating in creating, implementing or supporting analytical platforms projects in leading roles (architect, lead developer)
  • 2+ years’ experience in banking/finance, telecommunications or retail environment
  • 2+ years’ experience with industrial relational DBMS (Teradata, Oracle, DB2, etc.)
  • Experience with Hadoop is an advantage
  • Consultative behavior, result-driven and self-motivated
  • English skills: enough to participate in business meetings, technical classes and written communications
  • Good understanding of data modelling

What we offer:

  • Career and professional development opportunities
  • Annual bonus
  • Meal allowance
  • Mobile phone allowance
  • Medical and life insurance
  • Continuing Education, World-class technical training within Teradata University
  • Employee referral program

Teradata is an equal opportunity employer in all aspects of our business. We are excited by the unique qualities, abilities, and perspectives each person brings, and candidates are considered on all the fundamentals they may bring to the role and the team.
